thread.title: Kanal Trailer: Mystery is central theme in Mohanlal’s latest
thread.title_full: Kanal Trailer: Mystery is central theme in Mohanlal’s latest

author: R Vishal | India.com Staff
title: Kanal Trailer: Mystery is central theme in Mohanlal’s latest
text:
Kanal Trailer: Mystery is central theme in Mohanlal’s latest By India.com Staff on October 10, 2015 at 5:19 PM Comments 
After the immense success of Dhrishyam , Malayalam superstar Mohanlal has gone off the boil a little bit. He desperately needs another big hit. With the likes of Fahadh Faazil, Dulquer Salman and Nivin Pauly making waves in the industry, the two yesteryear stalwarts — Mohanlal and Mammooty — are left playing catch up. This mystery thriller, directed by M. Padmakumar is another shot a glory from the three-time National Award winner. He has an ensemble cast with him. Anoop Menon, Atul Kulkarni, Pratap Pothen and Honey Rose play vital roles in the film. 
The premise of Kanal is set against the struggles of the life in the Middle East, which has a large Malayali contingent. Money laundering, bankruptcy, infidelity and the seedy underworld all form the crux of the story. From the looks of it, the 55-year-old actor has shades of grey in his role. Expectations have been largely subdue from this flick but only time will tell if this will be Mohanlal’s next big success. As for now, the trailer looks sleek and doesn’t give much away and certainly has the makings of a hit. Watch the trailer below:
